features: Flexible Earhook Design For Sport: Comfort and secure fit with light weight and ergonomic design,supper stablity with earhook, in-ear fitting tips and headband, great for Running, Jogging, Hiking, Biking, Gym, Working out outdoor or home.

Powerful Bass Stereo Sound: Upgraded bluetooth earbuds with 11mm dynamic drivers and clear calls technology, our ear buds deliver superior sound quality, powerful bass, and crystal-clear phone calls. Enjoy your music and conversations with unmatched clarity.

Up To 16 Hours Playtime: With an improved polymer lithium battery, Boean sports headphones offer up to 16 hours of playtime . Enjoy a superior audio experience with extended endurance, allowing you to immerse yourself in your favorite music or engage in important conversations without interruption. We recommend using the included USB C cable for faster charging. No other cable is recommended.

One Step And Auto Pair: Running Headphones equipped with the latest bluetooth 5.3 technology, easy to connect to your electronic device such as IOS/Android/Windows equipment, and 1 SECOND auto pair to your device next time.

IPX7 Waterproof: With ergonomic design and silicone ear hooks, wireless headphones secure stay on your ears, feel great to wear and will never fall out. Upgraded Waterproof Rating, 100% prevents ordinary splashing water and rain.

How to Pair earbuds for the first time? -Press and hold the MFB for 3s. The device has entered pairing mode when the LED flash red and blue lights alternately. -Next, turn on your Bluetooth device, enter mobile phone‘s Bluetooth setting and choose the list of devices to pair the earbuds. How to reset? -Please press and hold the + and - buttons simultaneously for 3 seconds in a non-charging state. Are this bluetooth headphones compatible with Android or iOS? -Yes, this wireless earbuds are widely compatible with iOS/Android/Windows system or any other Bluetooth-enabled devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, I am absolutely in love with the Boean Bluetooth Headphones! They have made a world of difference in my running routine. One of the best features is the impressive 16 hours of playtime. I can easily go for long runs without worrying about the battery dying. Plus, they work flawlessly with my Android phone. Pairing them is a breeze, and the sound quality is top-notch. I also appreciate how lightweight and comfortable they are. They stay in place no matter how intense my workout gets. The controls are super easy to use, and the built-in microphone is a game-changer for hands-free calls. Overall, these headphones are a game-changer for any Android user like me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price, Great Earbuds
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My Skullcandy earbuds that I've had for years are falling apart and I wanted another pair that you can drape around your neck. I came across these and it checked all the boxes that was looking for. I also love that it comes with it's own case.Sound Quality: For the price, I was not expecting it to be this good. They aren't noise canceling (to me), but I personally don't mind. One thing that made me try this pair was it said it has great bass and I can confirm that it does sound great for the price!Comfortable: They are extremely comfortable in my opinion. I actually forget that I'm wearing them. They come with extra size silicon ear buds so it can accommodate different sizes. The part that goes behind your ears are also silicon and comfortable. It hasn't bothered me at all, even when sweating.Battery Life: I haven't had them that long, but from what I can tell that battery life seems to be good.Sweat Resistance: I'm not sure if they are water proof, but I can confirm they are sweat resistance.All in all, I am very pleased with this purchase. It meets all my expectations and honestly think this is the best pair of earbuds I have ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Update: They're Actually Pretty Good
reviews.reviewText: Update: So the company reached out about my original review and worked to get me a new pair. The new pair sounds great. That weird can like echo is gone. Also the glitch isn't there either. The company was super polite and so nice about helping me get a pair that suited me. I do a lot of shifting at work and I need to listen to something to break up the monotony of it all. These definitely get me through 8 plus hours. I don't have to charge them every day so the battery seems to be long lasting. Pretty good for the price.Original Review: Okay, I GuessI bought these in a pinch as I use my headphones for work and replacing my old pair with my normal brand was unavailable. I like the color scheme but the sound is...hollow? Like sometimes it sounds like I'm listening through a tin can. And every time I stop and start something that plays sound, it forces the volume bar to pop up onscreen. I'll have to replace them something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Day one looks good so far
reviews.reviewText: Well, I bought a $220 set of Sony earphones i had to ship back. These $20 ones work fine. 6 hours of battery life so far with no problems, and my wife is happy. I had a problem with Sony xbh, and bought these to try out some debug on the TV and phone. The sonys would not connect to the tv. These work good on the phone and TV for the purpose. Remember this review is for Day 1 results. The songs sound decent. Now I am not sure about noise cancellation features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang For The Buck!
reviews.reviewText: I've bought 2 pairs of these headphones-- the first one lasted me almost 2 years and I went pretty hard on them. They're my workout headphones, so they stay in my car when I'm not using them. I guess the noise canceling works perfectly, because I can never hear anything except for my own music at the gym. The battery life is great. I only have to charge them once every 3-4 uses, and I only charge them on my way to the gym which is less than 10 minutes away. I also use them in the sauna almost every single day, so I'm surprised they lasted as long as they did before having to purchase a new pair.My second pair however, one of the volume buttons stopped working after only a few weeks, and when I messaged customer support they responded same day and had a new pair out to me within the week. Honestly, the best pair of headphones for the price, if you're looking for rugged use. They're durable and the sound is perfect for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great disposable headphones
reviews.reviewText: I have a love/hate relationship with these headphones. I can only give them 3 stars because they just don't last, but I really like them and they are at a price point where I can replace them without getting too upset.They have good sound and are comfortable to wear while working, running, or for normal day-to-day use. I typically keep just one side in when I'm listening to a podcast or on a phone call, and then have the option to put the 2nd side in when I'm listening to music or using power tools.The downside is that the are effectively disposable headphones. I have bought over a dozen of these under different brand names over the past several years, averaging a new pair about every 6 months. They work great until they don't. Sometimes they stop taking a charge. Sometimes they start to randomly shut off while using them despite having plenty of charge left. Sometimes one side or the other just stops working for no reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT BATTERY LIFE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pair of earphones to use when I go to the gym. So I only have them on every other day. I used them on Monday and then put them back in their case. On Wednesday, when I put them on, I noticed that the blue light was flashing. I had left them on since I went to the gym on Monday morning. Today is Wednesday (I go Monday, Wednesday and Friday). I was afraid that it would not last through my workout. But they worked perfectly! They last the whole session without a problem. Now I can't speak to sound quality because I am not really bothered by the sound of my headphones. I like the music coming out of them. It is loud enough to drown out most noise and to me, the pitch is beautiful. The only thing I can say negative is that it does not totally drown out the surrounding sounds. But our gym has a basketball court and they get pretty loud. I don't know if anything could drown them out! I think for the price, these are a great set of earphones!

reviews.reviewTitle: Porquera duro apenas 1 mes e meio!
reviews.reviewText: Nao sei porque me apresei a investir em algo assim. Era ,uito bom para ser verdade.
